message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a quarter, but I'm hoping for more
I'll give you a third, but I'm hoping you'll see this as a generous offer!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm still hoping for a better deal
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a tiny bit more
I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction, but I'm taking the majority!
I'm not getting any more, I'm going all in on myself!
